strings.welcomeText: Welcome to the Catch The Wolf Task!

changeCenterSquare.en:
When you have to predict the center square
will change from a full square to this open square

chooseNextPosition.en:
Choose the next position of the wolf
D: Top Right -- K: Top left
C: Bottom Right -- M: Bottom Left

aLittleSquareShowsYourChoice.en: A little square shows your choice

rabbitFirstDisapearMessage.en:
The wolf and the rabbit only appear for a short time.
Wait until the cross change before predicting!

wolfFmriFirstAppearMessage.en:
You will also see the wolf during this level.
Blocks between rabbit and wolf trials will be separated by a short break.

blackoutFirstAppearMessage.en: On the last trial, there was no prediction phase the central cross did not change. You will get some trials of that form in the next level.

taskStoppedMessage.en:
Ouch! üòï
The task was prematurely stopped. It will not be possible to try again.

prematureEndPauseAboveThreshold.en: Pause time beyond maximum threshold (5 min per level)

pauseText.en: The game is now paused ! Hit any key to restart.

timeLimitText.en: You have {n} seconds until it is prematurely stopped !

finishedBlockTransition.en:
You finished block {b} !
You have {n} seconds remaining for your break.
Hit a key when you want to start.

lostConnectionContent.en:
You lost connection !
Close to reconnect. If you spend more than 30min disconnected the task will not be achievable.

taskFinishedContent.en:
